properties.description: Tea & Newspapers - Mondays and Fridays 10.30am, Rhythm & Rhyme (0-4yrs) - Mondays 10.30am, Knit & Knatter - Tuesdays 11am, Lego Club (5+yrs) - Wednesdays 3.30pm, Adult Reading Group - 1st Thursday of the month 3pm
